sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import api from "../../services/api" import { Chart as ChartJS, CategoryScale, LinearScale, PointElement, LineElement, BarElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend, ArcElement, } from "chart.js" import { Line, Bar, Pie } from "react-chartjs-2" // Register ChartJS components ChartJS.register(CategoryScale, LinearScale, PointElement, LineElement, BarElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend, ArcElement) const AdminDashboard = () => { const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalPatients: 0, totalDentists: 0, totalAppointments: 0, appointmentsToday: 0, appointmentsThisWeek: 0, appointmentsThisMonth: 0, }) const [appointmentsByStatus, setAppointmentsByStatus] = useState({ scheduled: 0, completed: 0, cancelled: 0, noShow: 0, }) const [appointmentsByType, setAppointmentsByType] = useState({ checkUp: 0, cleaning: 0, filling: 0, extraction: 0, rootCanal: 0, other: 0, }) const [appointmentsByMonth, setAppointmentsByMonth] = useState([]) const [recentAppointments, setRecentAppointments] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [error, setError] = useState("") useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData() }, []) const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { setLoading(true) // Fetch dashboard statistics const statsRes = await api.get("/api/admin/stats") setStats(statsRes.data) // Fetch appointment distribution by status const statusRes = await api.get("/api/admin/appointments/by-status") setAppointmentsByStatus(statusRes.data) // Fetch appointment distribution by type const typeRes = await api.get("/api/admin/appointments/by-type") setAppointmentsByType(typeRes.data) // Fetch appointment trends by month const trendRes = await api.get("/api/admin/appointments/by-month") setAppointmentsByMonth(trendRes.data) // Fetch recent appointments const recentRes = await api.get("/api/admin/appointments/recent") setRecentAppointments(recentRes.data) setError("") } catch (err) { setError("Failed to fetch dashboard data. Please try again.") console.error(err) } finally { setLoading(false) } } // Format date for display const formatDate = (dateString) => { const options = { year: "numeric", month: "short", day: "numeric" } return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString(undefined, options) } // Chart data for appointments by status const statusChartData = { labels: ["Scheduled", "Completed", "Cancelled", "No Show"], datasets: [ { data: [ appointmentsByStatus.scheduled, appointmentsByStatus.completed, appointmentsByStatus.cancelled, appointmentsByStatus.noShow, ], backgroundColor: [ "rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.6)", "rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.6)", "rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.6)", "rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.6)", ], borderColor: [ "rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)", "rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)", "rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)", "rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)", ], borderWidth: 1, }, ], } // Chart data for appointments by type const typeChartData = { labels: ["Check-up", "Cleaning", "Filling", "Extraction", "Root Canal", "Other"], datasets: [ { label: "Appointments by Type", data: [ appointmentsByType.checkUp, appointmentsByType.cleaning, appointmentsByType.filling, appointmentsByType.extraction, appointmentsByType.rootCanal, appointmentsByType.other, ], backgroundColor: "rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.6)", borderColor: "rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)", borderWidth: 1, }, ], } // Chart data for appointments by month const monthlyChartData = { labels: appointmentsByMonth.map((item) => item.month), datasets: [ { label: "Appointments", data: appointmentsByMonth.map((item) => item.count), fill: false, backgroundColor: "rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.6)", borderColor: "rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)", tension: 0.1, }, ], } return (

Admin Dashboard

Manage Patients Manage Dentists Manage Appointments
{error && (
{error}
)} {loading ? (

Loading dashboard data...

) : ( <> {/* Stats Cards */}
Total Patients
{stats.totalPatients}
View all patients
Total Appointments
{stats.totalAppointments}
View all appointments
Today's Appointments
{stats.appointmentsToday}
View today's schedule
{/* Charts */}

Appointments by Status

Appointments by Type

Monthly Appointment Trends

{/* Recent Appointments */}

Recent Appointments

A list of the most recent appointments.

{recentAppointments.map((appointment) => ( ))}
Patient Dentist Date & Time Type Status Actions
{appointment.patient.firstName} {appointment.patient.lastName}
{appointment.patient.email}
Dr. {appointment.dentist.firstName} {appointment.dentist.lastName}
{formatDate(appointment.date)}
{appointment.startTime} - {appointment.endTime}
{appointment.type.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + appointment.type.slice(1).replace("-", " ")}
{appointment.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + appointment.status.slice(1)} View
)}
) } export default AdminDashboard
